title: WellBarrierElementTest
description: Describes a complete sequence to test for the Well Integrity

id.description: Previously called ResourceID or SRN which identifies this OSDU resource object without version.
id.title: Entity ID

kind.description: The schema identification for the OSDU resource object following the pattern {Namespace}:{Source}:{Type}:{VersionMajor}.{VersionMinor}.{VersionPatch}. The versioning scheme follows the semantic versioning, https://semver.org/.
kind.title: Entity Kind

version.description: The version number of this OSDU resource; set by the framework.
version.title: Version Number

acl.description: The access control tags associated with this entity.
acl.title: Access Control List

legal.description: The entity's legal tags and compliance status. The actual contents associated with the legal tags is managed by the Compliance Service.
legal.title: Legal Tags

tags.title: Tag Dictionary
tags.description: A generic dictionary of string keys mapping to string value. Only strings are permitted as keys and values.

createTime.description: Timestamp of the time at which initial version of this OSDU resource object was created. Set by the System. The value is a combined date-time string in ISO-8601 given in UTC.
createTime.title: Resource Object Creation DateTime

createUser.title: Resource Object Creation User Reference
createUser.description: The user reference, which created the first version of this resource object. Set by the System.

modifyTime.description: Timestamp of the time at which this version of the OSDU resource object was created. Set by the System. The value is a combined date-time string in ISO-8601 given in UTC.
modifyTime.title: Resource Object Version Creation DateTime

modifyUser.title: Resource Object Version Creation User Reference
modifyUser.description: The user reference, which created this version of this resource object. Set by the System.

ancestry.description: The links to data, which constitute the inputs, from which this record instance is derived.
ancestry.title: Ancestry

meta.description: The Frame of Reference meta data section linking the named properties to self-contained definitions.
meta.title: Frame of Reference Meta Data

RigUtilizationID.title: Rig Utilization ID
RigUtilizationID.description: The ID of the Rig on which the test will be performed

WellboreID.title: Wellbore ID
WellboreID.description: The ID of the Wellbore on which the test will be performed

WellActivityProgramID.title: Well Activity Program ID
WellActivityProgramID.description: The ID of the Well Activity Program that holds the Phase description

WellActivityProgramPhaseSequenceNumber.title: Well Activity Program Phase Sequence Number
WellActivityProgramPhaseSequenceNumber.description: Number that identifies the Phase within its WellActivityProgram.

WellboreArchitectureID.title: Wellbore Architecture ID
WellboreArchitectureID.description: The ID of the Wellbore Architecture applicable at the time of the test

WBETestPlanName.title: Well Barrier Element Test Plan Name
WBETestPlanName.description: The name of the Well Barrier Element Test Plan

TestTypeID.title: Test Type ID
TestTypeID.description:
References an Open reference list for the Well Barrier Element Test Type.
Different test types will have different templated pass/fail or acceptance criteria. The list is Reference data has governance open to allow for addition of different test types (e.g. BSEE BOP test and A. N. Other BOP Test)

TestSubTypeID.title: Test Sub Type ID
TestSubTypeID.description: The Well Barrier Element Test Sub-Type - typically the barrier component being tested. For example, a test of a Packer/Hanger. Free text or Open list (perhaps local)

OperationalProcedureDescription.title: Operational Procedure Description
OperationalProcedureDescription.description: Textual description of the operational procedure and decision points

TestSteps.title: Test Steps
TestSteps.description: One or more test steps, their parameters and their criteria

items.title: W.B.E. Test Step
items.description: Description of an individual step of the overall Well Barrier Element Test

StepNumber.title: Step Number
StepNumber.description: An integer that describes the order in which the pressure test steps will be performed

CriteriaTemplateName.title: Criteria Template Name
CriteriaTemplateName.description: The name of a pass/fail or acceptance criteria template that applies for the step

HighPressureCriteria.title: High Pressure Criteria
HighPressureCriteria.description: Link to the object containing the high pressure criteria.

items.title: Pressure Criteria
items.description: Generic description of an individual pressure criterion for a single step of the test

TargetPressureMin.title: Target Pressure Minimum
TargetPressureMin.description: A successful positive pressure test requires the pressure to remain above the minimum allowable target test pressure.

TargetPressureMax.title: Target Pressure Maximum
TargetPressureMax.description: A successful negative pressure test or inflow test using the shut-in pressure method requires the pressure to remain below the maximum allowable target test pressure.

ValidationDuration.title: Validation Duration
ValidationDuration.description: The time duration for which a pressure test must “hold” (to a prescribed testing criteria) in order for the test to be validated (typically minutes e.g. 5mins (BOP, 30mins Casing)

MaxAllowedPercentageDecline.title: Maximum Allowed Percentage Decline
MaxAllowedPercentageDecline.description: the maximum allowable pressure loss for a pressure decline test (expressed as a percentage of test pressure)

MaxAllowedAbsoluteDecline.title: Maximum Allowed Absolute Decline
MaxAllowedAbsoluteDecline.description: the maximum allowable pressure loss for a pressure decline test (expressed as an absolute value)

MaxAllowedRateOfChange.title: Maximum Allowed Rate of Change
MaxAllowedRateOfChange.description: Criteria pressure rate of change for a flat-line test. Averaged over the duration of  the Validation Duration

IsHigh.title: Is High
IsHigh.description: Boolean that states if the criteria are for the high pressure stage (low pressure stage otherwise)

LowPressureCriteria.title: Low Pressure Criteria
LowPressureCriteria.description: Link to the object containing the low pressure criteria .

items.title: Pressure Criteria
items.description: Generic description of an individual pressure criterion for a single step of the test

TargetPressureMin.title: Target Pressure Minimum
TargetPressureMin.description: A successful positive pressure test requires the pressure to remain above the minimum allowable target test pressure.

TargetPressureMax.title: Target Pressure Maximum
TargetPressureMax.description: A successful negative pressure test or inflow test using the shut-in pressure method requires the pressure to remain below the maximum allowable target test pressure.

ValidationDuration.title: Validation Duration
ValidationDuration.description: The time duration for which a pressure test must “hold” (to a prescribed testing criteria) in order for the test to be validated (typically minutes e.g. 5mins (BOP, 30mins Casing)

MaxAllowedPercentageDecline.title: Maximum Allowed Percentage Decline
MaxAllowedPercentageDecline.description: the maximum allowable pressure loss for a pressure decline test (expressed as a percentage of test pressure)

MaxAllowedAbsoluteDecline.title: Maximum Allowed Absolute Decline
MaxAllowedAbsoluteDecline.description: the maximum allowable pressure loss for a pressure decline test (expressed as an absolute value)

MaxAllowedRateOfChange.title: Maximum Allowed Rate of Change
MaxAllowedRateOfChange.description: Criteria pressure rate of change for a flat-line test. Averaged over the duration of  the Validation Duration

IsHigh.title: Is High
IsHigh.description: Boolean that states if the criteria are for the high pressure stage (low pressure stage otherwise)

ComponentsTested.title: Components Tested
ComponentsTested.description: Text string for noting the components tested

StepNotes.title: Step Notes
StepNotes.description: Additional notes on the test step

SchematicID.title: Schematic ID
SchematicID.description: The ID of a schematic document that describes the pressure path / line-up

ParallelWBETestStepIDs.title: Parallel Well Barrier Element Test Step IDs
ParallelWBETestStepIDs.description: For use when executing simultaneous tests using two or more different sets of criteria

ExpectedPressureChangeDueToThermalEffect.title: Expected Pressure Change Due To Thermal Effects
ExpectedPressureChangeDueToThermalEffect.description: The expected pressure change due to thermal effects

ExpectedPressureChangeDueToThermalEffect.title: Expected Pressure Change Due To Thermal Effects Comments
ExpectedPressureChangeDueToThermalEffect.description: Comments on the expected pressure change due to thermal effects. Can be used to provide an explanation as to why a value was not entered (e.g. expansion not expected to impact test results)

TotalVolumeTestSystem.title: Total Volume Test System
TotalVolumeTestSystem.description: The cumulative total volume of the systems lined up for the test

ComponentVolumesTestSystem.title: Component Volumes Test System
ComponentVolumesTestSystem.description: A list of systems and their volumes.

items.title: Component Volumes Test System
items.description: Description of the tested component during a singe step.

SystemComponentName.title: System Component Name
SystemComponentName.description: e.g. surface lines, choke/kill Lines, BOP, Casing

SystemComponentVolume.title: System Component Volume
SystemComponentVolume.description: The volume of the named system

ExpectedVolumesPumped.title: Expected Volumes Pumped
ExpectedVolumesPumped.description: A list of pressures and the expected volume pumped at the given pressure.

items.title: Expected Volume
items.description: Individual description, for a given pressure, of the Volume Pumped expectations for a single step of the test.

MinimumVolume.title: Minimum Cumulative Volume Pumped
MinimumVolume.description: Minimum expected  volume pumped at specified pressure

Volume.title: Expected Cumulative Volume Pumped
Volume.description: Expected volume pumped at specified pressure

MaximumVolume.title: Maximum Cumulative Volume Pumped
MaximumVolume.description: Maximum expected volume pumped at specified pressure

ExpectedVolumesBledBack.title: Expected Volumes BledBack
ExpectedVolumesBledBack.description: A list of pressures and the expected volume bled back at the given pressure.

items.title: Expected Volume
items.description: Individual description, for a given pressure, of the Volume Pumped expectations for a single step of the test.

MinimumVolume.title: Minimum Cumulative Volume Pumped
MinimumVolume.description: Minimum expected  volume pumped at specified pressure

Volume.title: Expected Cumulative Volume Pumped
Volume.description: Expected volume pumped at specified pressure

MaximumVolume.title: Maximum Cumulative Volume Pumped
MaximumVolume.description: Maximum expected volume pumped at specified pressure

TestFluids.title: Test Fluids
TestFluids.description: A list of test fluids and their properties.

items.title: Test Fluid
items.description: Description, for a given step of the test, of the Fluid System used for this step.

TestFluidTypeID.title: Test Fluid Type ID
TestFluidTypeID.description: Same type reference list as used in Fluids Program

FluidDensityTest.title: Test Fluid Density
FluidDensityTest.description: Density value for the test fluid

FluidDensitySystem.title: System Fluid Density
FluidDensitySystem.description: Density value for the system fluid
